name: JUANCODEV

projects.title: Store Online Demo
projects.description: demonstration of an online store, where you can visualize the products, see your cart and see a more detailed product, soon will be implemented method of payment

projects.title: Stream Platform Demo
projects.description: Demo of a web platform where you can sell streaming services: netflix, disney, HBO Max, and more. You can keep track of registered workers, services, reports and sales statistics.

projects.title: React TO DO Machine
projects.description: Project created in react to learn all about the fundamental concepts of the library.

projects.title: Fox Image Generator
projects.description: A generic React component to load images with lazy loading. Added images will not be downloaded until they are visible on the screen.

projects.title: Technical Test: Form
projects.description: In this technical test I put into practice my knowledge in React and TypeScript with a login and validate if the user exists or not, and validate a complete record. Data persistence with Firebase

services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: Development of web applications according to the client's requirements and effective work with the best technologies.

services.title: Programming Instructor
services.description: Teach programming professionals with the technologies and advice to master programming.

aboutpara: Full-stack developer with 3 years of experience, as a frontend I have a solid command of technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, CSS, HTML and Tailwind, Bootstrap, and I have worked with frameworks such as Next.js. My experience also extends to backend development, where I have handled Nodejs, Express and Python, FastAPI, and have interacted with databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, Firebase and SQL Server. My passion for programming is reflected in my role as a teacher, where I enjoy sharing my knowledge and helping others advance in the technology field.

resume.description: I have a solid command of technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, CSS, HTML and Tailwind, Bootstrap, Next.js, Nodejs, Express and Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, Firebase and SQL Server.

experiences.position: Learning and Development Specialist at EDTecnica
experiences.bullets: Focused on teaching best practices to train professionals in the world of Full-Stack programming.

experiences.position: Frontend Developer at Evolution Consulting & Technologies
experiences.bullets: Migration of the administrative project as a desktop application to web application. My job is to take care of the frontend using: Html5, Css3, JavaScript and React.

experiences.position: Frontend Developer Jr at C.A de Seguros La Occidental
experiences.bullets: Creation of the company's intranet using Wordpress and PHP for plugin modifications, incident management system for vehicles and maintenance of web applications using: PHP and Laravel.
